features: 【Excellent Performance Tablets】This Android Tablet K11 Featuring with Newest Android 13 OS, Powerful Quad-core Performance CPU. Ensure Faster and more Responsive Using Experience for Quick APP Launches, Smooth Light Games and Videos.

【Great View and More Responsive】This 10 inch Tablet Pad Adopts a 1280 x 800 IPS Display, Presenting a Bright Display with Vivid Colors for a more True-to-life Viewing experience, Brings you a Crisper and Brighter image. Featuring with 10 inch Capacitive touch, Ensure a more Fluently Action for Movie and Video.

【More Functional Tablet】Android Tablet with Front 2.0 Mega pixel, Back 5.0 Mega pixel camera with Flash Light, Support Bluetooth, Built-in GPS, 64GB Storage (Most 256GB Expand, card not included), 1080P Videos. Meets Reading, Photograph, videos, Music, etc. Suitable for Most Life Scenarios.

【6000 mAh Long-Life Battery】Tablets Equipped with a 6000mAh Built-in Rechargeable Battery, Enables about 6 Hours Mixed-use when Travelling. Read e-Books, Listen to Music, Watch a Movie, Play a Game, or Surf the Internet, This tablet will be a Perfect Choice.

【Fast Connect】2024 Newest Tablet Computers Stay Connected with Built-in Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Perfect for Fast Connecting Network. Bring a well experience when surfing internet. Type C cable for fast transfer data. Kindly Note: this is a WIFI tablet, NOT Support the SIM Card.

【1-Year Warranty】Our tablet comes with 1-year quality warranty. Please contact us if you have any questions about this tablet, we will give you on-time tech support and the better customer service. Best Gift Choice: Ideal gift for your friends, husband ,father , mother , Christmas, New Year, Thanksgiving ,Easter and Birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wierd Yet Fun!
reviews.reviewText: When I first started it was DOA due to no battery charge but after waiting a bit then starting it up while charging the teb was on the way to fully charging. The way it starts up is a commical rotating orb of what seems to be a long range camera lense...the weird part is that.The Tab has truely a beautiful screen easy activation barring those Play Protect updates, that being important of course. For the price and propper care I can not see any reason to downgrade it...runs very good, my Husband loves it. LB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were so so bad. I wish I could give them no stars. I bought them for my kids for Christmas. I always set things up before Christmas so they can just use them that morning. Good thing I did. They are super slow and blurry. Unusable. I am returning them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Probably fine for some, not for me
reviews.reviewText: After about a day of usage, I have initiated a return. Since this product didn't have any reviews, I took a chance, and unfortunately this just won't work for me and my needs. The bad outweigh the good by a lot, specifically the download speed and the processor or RAM.While this would probably make a cheap, great tablet for a child or grandparent, I wouldn't recommend using this as someone who has had tablets before or uses a decent phone as a comparison. If the latter, you will likely be disappointed.The good:1. The best thing is the price. For under $50, if the below doesn't scare you off, then by all means buy this device. It works, and it works "okay", but I probably should have done more research and set my expectations lower at this price point.2. The device itself seems fine. Standard plastic back that would get scratched pretty easily, but I wouldn't care.3. Battery life seems pretty good, though charging is slow.4. Sound quality seems fine, but I have not done extensive testing with media.5. Very few bloatware apps and the ones that are included can be disabled.6. Standard 3.5mm headphone jack is included, as well as a SD card slot for more storage.The bad:1. The screen feels like plastic, and has an odd feel to it. It's almost like a satin finish instead of a glossy finish I'm used to. It gives a bit more resistance to swiping than I prefer.2. It's pretty slow. Slow to load apps, slow to download (even on 5g I was getting around 9 Mbps, as opposed to other devices that get around 100+ Mbps), difficult to swipe up to unlock (it doesn't work half the time), slow to bring up the keyboard sometimes, etc. I assume the largest bottleneck is the processor. It doesn't scroll smoothly and jitters when scrolling through email (Gmail app), or virtually any website. It also doesn't load images on websites properly, I assume to save either RAM or processing power. The device only seems to load on demand, instead of loading the whole page in anticipation of looking at it. The slowness is the single most determent piece of the device. It's usable, but if you're used to any other reasonably priced tablet or phone, it becomes an annoyance. There is only 2GB of dedicated RAM, with another 2GB of the disk space being used to supplement.3. Screen resolution is low and everything (apps) is much larger than I prefer.4. While the included USB-C cable works fine, the existing USB-C I had that supports fast charging for my phone (that I share to charge with this device) and wall adapter wouldn't work, almost like it wouldn't fully click into the tablet, but works fine on my phone.5. Pretty standard Android Go edition that doesn't offer a lot of features standard Android OS does like multiple users, more robust display configurations, etc.6. The screen is extremely prone to scratches. After sterilizing the unit for return, the screen had light buff marks, even using a damp microfiber cloth.
